title: I have a question riot.
body:
Hey riot, 
i have a question.
Could you please make it like everytime a champion gets nurfed you offer for it to be refunded (not using a refund if you have any left)
Because i don't know if im going to want rek'sai anymore after she is nurfed.
Please make that change if possible and if not why?

From Warriorking123

replies.body:
You only buy champs because they were cheap (as in the gameplay department)?

If you love her, I can't see why you would wanna toss her away the moment she is nerfed unless she is gutted which I don't think it's the case here.

well sorry if i bugged u but i have heard that every champ is OP when they start off then they get massively nurfed. i just think it would be more fair if that happnened because my brother put money on the game for me to get it and all that happenes is she is nurfed and not that good anymore but i guesue i was being selfish not thinking about the staff and how much effort they already put in and how this would just be more effort.

anyway please dont nurf nocturn :)

from warriorking123

I'm sorry, but that is the stupidest question I have read all day.
At least 6 champions and altered in each patch and the amount of effort it would take to keep refunding everybody is ridiculous. There would be no point in having a free week rotation
When you get a new champ like Rek'Sai, you must accept the fact that their values may be dramatically altered.
lol, the nerf balanced her she is perfect now, no more cheap ass ap rek'sai games, im glad they nerfed her ty riot
